root.name: Disney's The Little Mermaid
root.description: The Little Mermaid is a Capcom developed and published side-scrolling action game for the NES and Gameboy, released in 1991.GameplayThe game largely takes place in the ocean, with Ariel swimming across a series of underwater stages. Similar to other Capcom licensed games like Chip 'N Dale: Rescue Rangers, Ariel can stun her enemies, then pick them up and throw them at others. Players can also dig for sea shells and find hidden treasure, eventually earning powerups to the number and size of bubbles that Ariel can use as projectiles.StoryThe story of the game takes place after the events of the film. In the game, Ursula, the evil Witch of the Sea, has cast a spell on all watery creatures. In order to save her friends, Ariel dives into the sea, becoming a mermaid again. But the water is full of jellyfish, lobsters, eels, and blowfish.StagesThe following stages, and their boss fights, are specific to the NES version of the game.1. The Sea of Coral. Boss: Great White Shark.2. Sunken Ship. Boss: Eels.3. Sea of Ice. Boss: Walrus.4. Undersea Volcano. Boss: Captain Seahorse.5. Ursula's Castle. Boss: Ursula. (and then Giant Ursula)
